name: General Medicine
description: Consultations with licensed doctors for common illnesses and checkups.

name: Nursing Care
description: Home-based care by certified nurses for recovery and chronic conditions.

name: Mental Health Support
description: Counseling and therapy services for emotional and psychological well-being.

name: Maternal & Child Care
description: Prenatal checkups, postnatal support, and pediatric consultations.

name: Pharmacy Services
description: Access to essential medicines and pharmacist guidance.

name: Mobile Clinic
description: Community outreach with mobile health units for remote areas.
